Changelog
=========


1.0.3 (2016-08-09)
------------------

- Remove metadata.xml-dependencie to ftw.simplelayout.
  This package is an addon of ftw.simplelayout and should not install it.
  [elioschmutz]

1.0.2 (2016-07-08)
------------------

- Add support for IE11 and MS Edge.
  [raphael schwob]


1.0.1 (2016-06-20)
------------------

- Init implementation.
  [raphael schwob]
